00021 
00022 #include "chipstream/ChipStreamDataTransform.h"
00023 #include "chipstream/ArtifactReduction.h"
00024 
00025 bool ChipStreamDataTransform::transformData(PsBoard &board, const DataStore &in, DataStore &out) {
00026   bool needTwoPass = false;
00027   if((InstanceOf(m_ChipStream, SketchQuantNormTran) && board.getOptions()->getOpt("target-sketch").empty()) || 
00028       InstanceOf(m_ChipStream, ArtifactReduction)) {
00029     Verbose::out(1, "Doing two passes.");
00030     needTwoPass = true;
00031   }
00032   
00033   /* Send the chip data through the chipstream object. */
00034   int numDataSets = in.getCelDataSetCount();
00035   Verbose::progressBegin(1, ToStr("Processing Chips"), numDataSets, 1, numDataSets);
00036   std::vector<float> data;
00037   for(int chipIx = 0; chipIx < in.getCelDataSetCount(); chipIx++) {
00038     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00039     data.clear();
00040     //    Verbose::out(3, "Reading " + m_ChipStream->getDocName() + " for chip: " + ToStr(chipIx));
00041     in.fillInCelData(chipIx, data);
00042     m_ChipStream->newChip(data);
00043     if(!needTwoPass) {
00044       for(int probeIx = 0; probeIx < data.size(); probeIx++) {
00045         data[probeIx] = m_ChipStream->transform(probeIx, chipIx, data[probeIx], board);
00046       }
00047       out.writeColumn(chipIx, in.getCelName(chipIx), data);
00048     }
00049   }
00050   Verbose::progressEnd(1, ToStr("Done."));
00051 
00052   if(needTwoPass) {
00053     m_ChipStream->finishedChips();
00054     Verbose::progressBegin(1, ToStr("Processing Stage Two Chips"), numDataSets, 1, numDataSets);
00055     /* Do the chipstream transformation and store the new intensities. */
00056     for(int chipIx = 0; chipIx < in.getCelDataSetCount(); chipIx++) {
00057       Verbose::progressStep(1);
00058     //      Verbose::out(3, "Applying " + m_ChipStream->getDocName() + " to chip: " + ToStr(chipIx));
00059       std::vector<float> data;
00060       in.fillInCelData(chipIx, data);
00061         
00062       for(int probeIx = 0; probeIx < data.size(); probeIx++) {
00063         data[probeIx] = m_ChipStream->transform(probeIx, chipIx, data[probeIx]);
00064       }
00065       out.writeColumn(chipIx, in.getCelName(chipIx), data);
00066     }
00067     Verbose::progressEnd(1, ToStr("Done."));
00068   }
00069   return true;
00070 }
